alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 6:50PM EDT until April 07 at 11:28AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Milledgeville affecting Washington, Wilkinson and Baldwin Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Milledgeville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconee River near Milledgeville. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24 feet, Minor flooding continues upstream and downstream from the gage located around one half mile upstream from the Georgia Highway 22 and 24 bridge. The parking lot and portions of the Oconee River Greenway Park just downstream from the bridge will be flooded. Low lying areas of woodlands and pasture near the river will be flooded one to two feet deep. Sinclair Dam will likely have two gates open to reach this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tonight to 24.7 feet tomorrow evening. It will fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 22 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
